item.title: Talks
item.description: Upcoming talks Nov 17 2021 - AI For Good :Better Better — machine learning for improved climate models and projections with Pierre Gentine. Register Nov 30th 2021 - DOE AI4ESP workshop. Plenary talk by Laure Zanna at 12pm ET. Register Oct 25th - Dec 3rd 2021 - DOE AI4ESP workshop. More information at this website Past talks Big Data Discover Pangeo Forge and how it can help us solve complex problems in climate and weather research here with Ryan Abernathey.
